name: Shell necklace
description: Gold earrings are an alliance of delicacy and character in a cosmic and bright design. Eternally chained to freedom: a daring and elegant jewel. A design filled with contemporary minimalism in a collection that represents the eternal duality of today’s women: free, dreamer and fighter.
